column4: another question is ... how can i auto login by default from shell instead of GUI Login windows (System-->> Preferences -->>Security -->Enable automatic) login
what are you tring to achieve ?
why do you need to autologin in case of a power failure ?
... well i have deployed some computer some where ... if power failure occurs and system reboots ... i can't manually login so i want to enable auto login for those systems ...
why do you need to autologin to login ?
